text: jetson@jetson:-$ curl -fsSL https://ollama.con/install.sh | sh >>> Installing ollama to /usr/local >>> Downloading Linux armé4 bundle 100.0% >>> Downloading JetPack 6 components 100.0% >>> Creating ollama user... >>> Adding ollama user to render group... >>> Adding ollama user to video group... >>> Adding current user to ollama group... >>> Creating ollama systemd service... >>> Enabling and starting ollama service...
